SALESFORCE HELP

REBATE MANAGEMENT
Create Payout Periods for a Rebate Program

You can manually create payout periods or automatically generate them for each rebate program. If you choose to automatically generate payout periods, they’re generated based on the program's frequency. Payouts are calculated during an active period and finalized at the end of each period. View the payout periods on the Payout Periods related list of a rebate program record.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions that have Rebate Management enabled.


USER PERMISSIONS
NEEDED
To create payout period:	Rebate Management Admin permission set.

Create payout periods in one of the following ways:

To create payout periods based on the duration of the rebate program and payout frequency, click Generate Payout Periods on a rebate program record.
To create payout periods with manually defined start and end dates, click New on the Payout Periods list of a program record. Repeat the action for the number of periods you want to define.
Considerations for Payout Periods
Review these considerations when you define payout periods for a rebate program.
Modify Automatically Generated Payout Periods (Example)
In this example, we show you how to manually edit an automatically generated payout period.
